This package is an implementation of the computations suggested by Tastle, W. J., & Wierman, M. J. (2007). Consensus and dissention: A measure of ordinal dispersion. *International Journal of Approximate Reasoning*, *45(3)*, 531â€“545. http://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijar.2006.06.024.

It has additional features suggested by [John F. Rauthmann](https://www.psychologie.hu-berlin.de/de/personal/7799242) and is maintained on GitHub by [Kai T. Horstmann](https://www.psychologie.hu-berlin.de/de/personal/91680294).
